gobblin.data.management.copy

Class CopyableFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.CopyEntity
      • gobblin.data.management.copy.CopyableFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    File, HasGuid

    public class CopyableFile
extends CopyEntity
implements File
    Abstraction for a file to copy from origin to destination. CopyableFiles should be created using a CopyableFile.Builder obtained with the method builder(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem, org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path, gobblin.data.management.copy.CopyConfiguration).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CopyableFile.Builder
      Builder for creating CopyableFiles.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class gobblin.data.management.copy.CopyEntity

        CopyEntity.DatasetAndPartition

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gobblin.data.management.copy.CopyEntity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CopyableFile.Builder builder(FileSystem originFs, FileStatus origin, Path datasetRoot, CopyConfiguration copyConfiguration)
      Deprecated. 
      use fromOriginAndDestination(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem, org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path, gobblin.data.management.copy.CopyConfiguration). This method was changed to remove reliance on dataset root which is not standard of all datasets. The old functionality on inferring destinations cannot be achieved without dataset root and common dataset root, so this is an approximation. Copyable datasets should compute file destinations themselves.
      String explain()
      Used for simulate runs.
      static CopyableFile.Builder fromOriginAndDestination(FileSystem originFs, FileStatus origin, Path destination, CopyConfiguration copyConfiguration) 
      FileStatus getFileStatus() 
      Guid guid()
      Generates a replicable guid to uniquely identify the origin of this CopyableFile.

      Computes the correct OwnerAndPermission obtained from replicating source owner and permissions and applying the PreserveAttributes rules in copyConfiguration.
      static List<OwnerAndPermission> resolveReplicatedOwnerAndPermissionsRecursively(FileSystem sourceFs, Path fromPath, Path toPath, CopyConfiguration copyConfiguration)
      Compute the correct OwnerAndPermission obtained from replicating source owner and permissions and applying the PreserveAttributes rules for fromPath and every ancestor up to but excluding toPath.

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        @Deprecated
public static CopyableFile.Builder builder(FileSystem originFs,
                                                       FileStatus origin,
                                                       Path datasetRoot,
                                                       CopyConfiguration copyConfiguration)
        Deprecated. use fromOriginAndDestination(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem, org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path, gobblin.data.management.copy.CopyConfiguration). This method was changed to remove reliance on dataset root which is not standard of all datasets. The old functionality on inferring destinations cannot be achieved without dataset root and common dataset root, so this is an approximation. Copyable datasets should compute file destinations themselves.
        Get a CopyableFile.Builder.
        Parameters:
        originFs - FileSystem where original file exists.
        origin - FileStatus of the original file.
        datasetRoot - Value of CopyableDataset#datasetRoot of the dataset creating this CopyableFile.
        copyConfiguration - CopyConfiguration for the copy job.
        Returns:
        a CopyableFile.Builder.

      • fromOriginAndDestination

        public static CopyableFile.Builder fromOriginAndDestination(FileSystem originFs,
                                                            FileStatus origin,
                                                            Path destination,
                                                            CopyConfiguration copyConfiguration)

      • resolveReplicatedOwnerAndPermission

        public static OwnerAndPermission resolveReplicatedOwnerAndPermission(FileSystem fs,
                                                                     Path path,
                                                                     CopyConfiguration copyConfiguration)
                                                              throws IOException
        Computes the correct OwnerAndPermission obtained from replicating source owner and permissions and applying the PreserveAttributes rules in copyConfiguration.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • resolveReplicatedOwnerAndPermissionsRecursively

        public static List<OwnerAndPermission> resolveReplicatedOwnerAndPermissionsRecursively(FileSystem sourceFs,
                                                                                       Path fromPath,
                                                                                       Path toPath,
                                                                                       CopyConfiguration copyConfiguration)
                                                                                throws IOException
        Compute the correct OwnerAndPermission obtained from replicating source owner and permissions and applying the PreserveAttributes rules for fromPath and every ancestor up to but excluding toPath.
        Returns:
        A list of the computed OwnerAndPermissions starting from fromPath, up to but excluding toPath.
        Throws:
        IOException - if toPath is not an ancestor of fromPath.
